```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ptm)
```

If you want to prep a submission to the UBC Herbarium you can select the PTM numbers you want to submit.
```{r, eval=FALSE}
df_herb <- ptm_to_herbarium(c("180", "192", "31"), tempfile("test_herb.xlsx"))
```

If you want to prep a submission to the BOLD with the same ptm numbers
```{r}
df_herb <- ptm_to_bold(c("180", "192", "31"), tempfile("test_bold.xlsx"))
```
